```{r}
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
BostonBikes::extract_zip()
my_trip_data <- BostonBikes::enrich_geospatial()
```

```{r}
head(my_trip_data)
summary_duration <- sqldf::sqldf("SELECT start_neighbourhood, end_neighbourhood, AVG(tripduration) as avg_trip_duration from my_trip_data where start_neighbourhood is not null group by 1,2")
summary_duration
```
